snippet: Since shunning attention after joining the New England Patriots, Chad Ochocinco has transitioned from flamboyant star to diminished afterthought, but is enjoying the “winning experience.”
abstract: New England Patriots receiver Chad Ochocinco has eschewed his trademark flamboyance since joining New England, saying he is glad to trade to the spotlight for a place on a winning team.
lead_paragraph: Since shunning attention after joining the New England Patriots, Chad Ochocinco has transitioned from flamboyant star to diminished afterthought, but is enjoying the “winning experience.”

headline.seo: Patriots’ Ochocinco Is Content Not to Be the Center of Attention
headline.main: Ochocinco Isn’t the Center of Attention, and He’s Not Complaining
headline.print_headline: Not Center of Attention And Not Complaining
